0.5.name: wordpress/dashboard-menus-cleaner
0.5.description:
This plugin will help you hide the default WordPress dashboard widgets like Incoming Links, etc. And also adds a Quick Menu Finder on your dashboard which would help save some time finding those menus that are deeply nested under a submenu.

You can also remove the Akismet Stats from your Dashboard Menu, Theme Editor, Plugin Editor, Custom Background, Custom Header as well.

Dashboard & Menu Cleaner built by Fedmich
